comments.author: Terry
comments.body: NOW you're talking my kind of riding... i'll leave the asphalt of flagstaff to you fitness freaks w/ long legs and big lungs. give me the dirt! Heil, Hall, or White Ranch... name the day and i'll be there. ;-) terry "temporarily anonymous" breheny

comments.author: Terry
comments.body: i'll be there... also invited a couple of folks from the school of ed. looks like great weather is in store! terry

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: "not a misprint" is a misprint. Sounds like fun but I just got off my last conference call of the week. Yes I know, time to go riding. Dennis

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: It's okay, Dennis. I won't give you a hard time about it in this forum; after all, didn't some employee just get sacked after talking smack on her blog about her boss?! See you on Flagstaff, then....
